title: Unlock the Power of Creatine: Increase Muscular Strength and Performance with This Cost-Effective Supplement
description140: Creatine is an effective, inexpensive supplement that can increase strength and performance. Some people may not respond to it, but age/genetics may play a role.
description300: Creatine is a supplement that has been shown to be effective in increasing muscular strength and performance. It is less expensive and more efficient than supplementation with other nutrients, and those who self-experiment with creatine are more likely to see positive effects. However, there are some individuals who are non-responders to creatine supplementation, and it's possible that age or genetic response plays a role.
author: Elsie Alkurabi
